headline: 2 S&P 500 Stocks to Target This Week and 1 We Brush Off
summary: While the S&P 500 (^GSPC) includes industry leaders, not every stock in the index is a winner. Some companies are past their prime, weighed down by poor execution, weak financials, or structural headwinds.

content.title: 2 S&P 500 Stocks to Target This Week and 1 We Brush Off
content.summary: While the S&P 500 (^GSPC) includes industry leaders, not every stock in the index is a winner. Some companies are past their prime, weighed down by poor execution, weak financials, or structural headwinds.

headline: Just The Facts: West Wits Mining, Energy Transition Minerals, Weebit Nano
summary: In today's Just The Facts.. West Wits Mining has been granted a new prospecting right in South Africa, next to its Witwatersrand Basin Project. The tenement extends depth potential at the Qala Shallows gold project, with modelling now underway to assess the Kimberley Reef. Energy Transition Minerals has appointed New York-based Cohen & Company as exclusive US advisor as it explores pathways to US capital markets, including a possible Nasdaq listing. Options being reviewed include a dual listing or a potential SPAC merger. Weebit Nano has licensed its ReRAM memory technology to Texas Instruments, a major global chipmaker. The agreement covers IP licensing and integration into TI’s advanced process nodes. Weebit also upgraded guidance, now forecasting minimum FY26 revenue of 10 million dollars following a run of recent customer agreements. #ASX #ASXNews #StockMarket #GoldStocks #TechStocks #Semiconductors #MemoryTech #Nasdaq #USMarkets #CriticalMinerals #EnergyTransition #MarketUpdate #WeebitNano

content.title: Just The Facts: West Wits Mining, Energy Transition Minerals, Weebit Nano
content.description:
In today's Just The Facts.. 

West Wits Mining has been granted a new prospecting right in South Africa, next to its Witwatersrand Basin Project. The tenement extends depth potential at the Qala Shallows gold project, with modelling now underway to assess the Kimberley Reef.

Energy Transition Minerals has appointed New York-based Cohen & Company as exclusive US advisor as it explores pathways to US capital markets, including a possible Nasdaq listing. Options being reviewed include a dual listing or a potential SPAC merger.

Weebit Nano has licensed its ReRAM memory technology to Texas Instruments, a major global chipmaker. The agreement covers IP licensing and integration into TI’s advanced process nodes. Weebit also upgraded guidance, now forecasting minimum FY26 revenue of 10 million dollars following a run of recent customer agreements.

#ASX #ASXNews #StockMarket #GoldStocks #TechStocks #Semiconductors #MemoryTech #Nasdaq #USMarkets #CriticalMinerals #EnergyTransition #MarketUpdate #WeebitNano

The tenement extends depth potential at the Qala Shallows gold project, with modelling now underway to assess the Kimberley Reef. Energy Transition Minerals has appointed New York-based Cohen & Company as exclusive US advisor as it explores pathways to US capital markets, including a possible Nasdaq listing. Options being reviewed include a dual listing or a potential SPAC merger. Weebit Nano has licensed its ReRAM memory technology to Texas Instruments, a major global chipmaker. The agreement covers IP licensing and integration into TI’s advanced process nodes.
